original_title: Le roi n'est pas mon cousin
overview: Author of "Sunny Karukera, stranded Guadeloupe" (1980), Elz√©a De Aventurin indulges, in 2017, in a series of interviews with her granddaughter. Together they trace, not without malice, a family history, sailing from one end of the black Atlantic to the other. A story for lack of silences, pride and revolt.
title: The King Is Not My Cousin
